TypeSignature.Value: public delegate bool VariationGlyphDelegate(Font font, object fontData, uint unicode, uint variationSelector, out uint glyph);
.class public auto ansi sealed VariationGlyphDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The user-specified font data associated with the font.
The Unicode code point to map.
The Unicode variation selector code point.
When this method returns, contains the glyph identifier for the variation.
Docs.summary: A callback delegate used to retrieve the glyph identifier for a Unicode code point with a specific variation selector.
Docs.returns: if a variation glyph was found; otherwise, .
